```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(viridis)
library(willbprocessed)
```

## Visualize Colors

```{r visualize_colors, echo=FALSE}


inputPanel(
  selectInput("pal", label = "Color Palette:",
              choices = c("viridis", "inferno", "magma", "plasma"), 
              selected = "viridis"),
  
  sliderInput("num_colors", label = "Number of Colors:",
              min = 1, max = 10, value = 5, step = 1)
)

renderPlot({
  pal <- do.call(input$pal, list(input$num_colors))
  willbprocessed::visualize_colors(pal)
})
```
